DataElement.preferredName: Index Date To Treatment Start Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number of days between the date used for index and the date the treatment started.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Index Date To Therapeutic Procedure Begin Day
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A date used as a reference point for ensuing events, often a diagnosis date, or a first visit date, or the date a patient enrolled in a study._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A date used as a reference point for ensuing events, often a diagnosis date, or a first visit date, or the date a patient enrolled in a study.

Concepts.definition: A date used as a reference point for ensuing events, often a diagnosis date, or a first visit date, or the date a patient enrolled in a study.

Property.preferredDefinition: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Concepts.definition: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Priority 3 of caDSR Requests Q12018 Dictionary Updates for Review (supplement). 3.14.18 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours._To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Determining the number or amount of something.
